title: Career Roadmap AI - Example Prompts for Testing
description: Comprehensive list of complex prompts covering IT and non-IT roles to demonstrate the career roadmap generation system

IT_Development_Roles: How to become a full-stack web developer with React and Node.js
I want to transition from frontend developer to backend engineer
Career path: Python developer to data scientist with machine learning
Learning AI and machine learning engineering from zero experience
Cloud architect specializing in AWS and microservices
Mobile app developer for iOS and Android using React Native
DevOps engineer with Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines
Database administrator specializing in optimization and performance tuning
Testing_QA_Roles: How to become software testing engineer with Selenium and Appium
QA automation engineer career with TestNG and Pytest
SDET (Software Development Engineer in Test) - combining development and testing
Performance testing engineer specializing in load testing with JMeter
API testing with Postman and REST API automation
Security testing and penetration testing career path
Mobile testing engineer for iOS and Android applications
Test automation architect designing testing frameworks
Cloud_DevOps_Roles: I want to become a cloud architect on Azure and AWS
DevOps engineer with Terraform and Kubernetes expertise
Site reliability engineer (SRE) focused on system reliability
Platform engineer building developer platforms and infrastructure
Cloud security engineer ensuring enterprise cloud security
Infrastructure automation with Ansible and Terraform
Data_Analytics_Roles: Data analyst career with SQL, Tableau, and Power BI
Data engineer building data pipelines with Apache Spark
Machine learning engineer with TensorFlow and PyTorch
Product analytics engineer using data for product decisions
Data scientist specializing in statistical analysis and modeling
Analytics engineer bridging data engineering and analytics
Non_IT_Roles: Career transition to product manager from software engineer
Business analyst with requirements gathering and SQL knowledge
Project manager transitioning to program management
Product owner in agile development environments
UX/UI designer interested in web and mobile design
Sales engineer bridging technical and sales teams
Business operations manager optimizing organizational processes
Scrum master and agile coach certification and career path
HR technology specialist implementing HR systems
Career_Transitions: 5 years backend developer looking to move into SDET role
Senior QA engineer transitioning to cloud architecture
Frontend developer interested in becoming a solutions architect
Data analyst aspiring to become a machine learning engineer
Systems administrator transitioning to cloud engineer
QA automation engineer wanting to become SDET
Manual tester transitioning to test automation
Non_IT_Career_Changes: HR professional transitioning to HR tech specialist
Financial analyst becoming a fintech engineer
Sales manager moving into sales engineering
Operations manager transitioning to business analysis
Marketing professional interested in product management
Customer success manager moving to product management
Content creator becoming a product manager with analytics
Designer transitioning to web and UX/UI development
Skill_Combinations: Web developer with React, TypeScript, and Node.js seeking growth
Python developer wanting to add machine learning and data science
Java backend developer interested in cloud platforms and Docker
QA engineer with Selenium and API testing expertise expanding
Full-stack developer adding DevOps and Kubernetes skills
Database professional adding Python and data engineering skills
Frontend developer learning backend with Java and Spring Boot
Complex_Scenarios: 10 years experience as backend developer, interested in becoming technical architect
Career switcher from non-tech background wanting to learn product management
Mid-level QA engineer with 3 years experience seeking SDET path
Self-taught developer wanting to formalize skills and move to tech lead
Bootcamp graduate starting as junior developer, roadmap for senior engineer
Technical lead wanting to transition to engineering management
Freelance developer wanting to transition to startup product engineering

testing_guidelines.description: How to use these prompts to test the system
steps: Copy a prompt from any category above
Send it to the /roadmap endpoint: POST /api/career/roadmap
Check that recommendations align with the prompt intent
Verify no rule-based logic dictates the matching (pure NLP should drive it)
Look for technologies and skills recommendations below the learning path
Note job market insights and salary ranges
validation_checklist: ✓ IT roles match to appropriate technical career paths
✓ Non-IT roles match to business/management paths
✓ Skill combinations identified and reflected in recommendations
✓ Complex scenarios handled with multi-factor matching
✓ Learning path shows 6 phases with realistic timelines

steps.prompt: I want to become a full-stack web developer with React and Node.js
5 years backend developer looking to move into SDET role
Career transition to product manager from software engineer
Data scientist specializing in machine learning and deep learning
steps.expected_match: Data Scientist OR Machine Learning Engineer

steps.prompt: Business analyst with SQL and data visualization tools

career_roadmap.description: Generate career roadmap for a given prompt

request_body.prompt: string (required) - The user's career goal or question

response.recommended_skills: Array of core skills to learn
response.salary_range_usd: Typical salary range for the role
response.matching_requirements: Open job requirements matching these skills
response.career_path: Typical career progression for this role

notes: System uses pure NLP-based matching driven by training data, not hardcoded rules
All career paths cover both IT and non-IT domains
Complex prompts are handled through entity extraction and semantic matching
Job requirements are matched against core skills to show relevant open positions
Career transitions are supported through multi-factor skill matching
